Konstantina Matthaiou

Junior Web Developer

MY NAME IS Konstantina Matthaiou.

I am looking forward a career as a junior web developer. I am passionate about learning new technologies and working with inspiring and motivated people.

More about me

I am working at the Hellenic Navy as an Electronic Technician with more than 9 years of experience. I am specialised on marine radar and naval tactical systems. Moreover, I am an IT professional and Networks administrator with experience in Microsoft Windows Server 2008 and CISCO equipment. Since 2018, I have focused in Software Development as a full-stack Developer working with ASP.NET MVC 5. Currently, I am improving my JavaScript skills with ES6 and taking courses for the CCNA v7 certification. I enjoy problem solving challenges and creating new things. That always motivates me to learn more and improve myself. My motto in life is “Always trying to be a better version of yourself”.

Work Experience

  • Ministry of Defence, Hellenic Navy, Athens, Greece
    2011 - Present

    • Electronic Technician - Marine radars, electronic devices, tactical systems

    • IT Personnel - Computer Networks, Windows administrator

    • Software Full-stack Developer - Projects for the Hellenic Navy

  • Projects

    • Firefighting record for Hellenic Navy - ASP.NET, MVC5, HTML Canvas, SQL server (keeping track of firefighting using symbols at ship’s drawing)

    • Hailing Database for Hellenic Navy - ASP.NET, MVC5, SQL server (record keeping of the hailing reports)

    • Movie Search (personal project) - HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON, OMDB API (movies searching from IMDB.com database using its public API)

    • Product Landing Pages (personal projects) - HTML, CSS (product landing pages and copy of existing one)

    • Technical Documentation (freeCodeCamp project) - HTML, CSS (Sass technical documentation copy page)
